description: Contains information about adjudication records, including the user and workstation that initiated the adjudication, the National Council for Prescription Drug Programs (NCPDP) transaction type, and the date the record was created. Adjudication records are used during prescription copay adjudication.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the adjudication record.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The record status category ID of the adjudication message (hidden, soft-deleted, etc...)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted

columns.name: ADJ_WORKSTATION_ID
columns.description: The workstation's unique ID that the adjudication attempt originated from.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The user who initiated the adjudication.

columns.name: RECORD_CREATION_DT
columns.description: Stores the date the record was created

columns.name: UPDATE_DATETIME
columns.description: Stores the instant the record was last locked/unlocked

columns.name: ADJ_INTENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The overall intent category ID of the adjudication message (for example, reversal or billing).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Billing


Reversal

columns.name: MESSAGE_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The source category ID of the adjudication message.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Pharmacy


Clinician Order Entry


Additional Coverage Information


Eligibility Query


HAAD Transaction

columns.name: ADJ_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The login department's unique ID for the user initiating adjudication.

columns.name: TEST_CLAIM_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the adjudication attempt is a test claim.  'N' or NULL indicate that the attempt is not a test claim.  'Y' indicates that the attempt is a test claim.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The patient record to which this RXA record is associated. For Eligibility checking, this identifies the patient for whom the check is being performed.
